model:
SpeckleDisplacementNet(
  (conv1): Conv2d(6, 32, kernel_size=(7, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 3))
  (conv2): Conv2d(32, 64, kernel_size=(5, 5), stride=(2, 2), padding=(2, 2))
  (conv3): Conv2d(64, 128, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(2, 2), padding=(1, 1))
  (conv4): Conv2d(128, 256, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(2, 2), padding=(1, 1))
  (conv5): Conv2d(256, 256, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(2, 2), padding=(1, 1))
  (conv6): Conv2d(256, 256, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1))
  (upconv5): ConvTranspose2d(256, 256, kernel_size=(4, 4), stride=(2, 2), padding=(1, 1))
  (iconv5): Conv2d(512, 128, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1))
  (upconv4): ConvTranspose2d(128, 128, kernel_size=(4, 4), stride=(2, 2), padding=(1, 1))
  (iconv4): Conv2d(256, 64, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1))
  (upconv3): ConvTranspose2d(64, 64, kernel_size=(4, 4), stride=(2, 2), padding=(1, 1))
  (iconv3): Conv2d(128, 32, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1))
  (upconv2): ConvTranspose2d(32, 32, kernel_size=(4, 4), stride=(2, 2), padding=(1, 1))
  (iconv2): Conv2d(64, 32, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1))
  (predict_flow): Conv2d(32, 2, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1))
)
